body.name: yocrovv Bluetooth Thermal Label Printer 4x6,Shipping Label Printer,Thermal Printer Compatible with iOS, Android, Windows,Mac, Amazon, Ebay, Etsy, USPS
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 28 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 28 mins
features: WIRELESS & SUPPORT FOR MULTI-SYSTEMS：The thermal printer allows wireless printing. For iOS, Android, and iPad users, they can download the App "Label Printer" and establish a Bluetooth connection. Windows users can also print through Bluetooth. Additionally, Windows, Mac, and Chromebook support USB connection.

HIGH TECH LABEL PRINTER：The printer has a Japanese thermal print head for high-quality printing at 203 DPI，150mm/s High-speed Printing Speed. It includes 15 extra sheets of labels. This printer is ink and toner-free, making it clean and economical. It works with fanfold and roll labels, but requires a label holder (not included). It supports labels with widths from 1.57" to 4.1".

SMALL & EFFICIENT：The thermal label printer is equipped with automatic calibration & positioning, intelligent paper return, and intelligent self-test, which minimize paper waste or jams. It ensures efficiency with a single click. Its compact size allows convenient usage at home, office, and warehouse.

MOST SIZES OF THERMAL LABEL ARE AVAILABLE：The Wireless Label Printer is compatible with thermal labels of any brand, ranging from 1.57" to 4.1" in width and with no height restrictions. It is versatile and can be utilized as a barcode label printer, postage label printer, package label printer, product label printer, name printer label machine, sticker label printer, UPC label printer, SKU label printer, and more.

EASY TO SET UP & RELIABLE AFTER-SALE SERVICE：Get ready within a minute. A U-Disk is included, containing printer driver, instructional videos.Additionally, a one-year warranty is provided, and customer support is available through email for assistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bluetooth printer at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I've got this setup on my phone and my Windows PC. Once you get everything setup it works well. The phone setup is actually the easiest and the instructions work great.PC setup with USB is pretty easy. PC setup with Bluetooth was little harder, but if you use the "Customized Installation" installer, you can select Bluetooth and it works well.I did notice that the labels print bolder on the Android App than they do on Windows, but both are usable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use from your phone
reviews.reviewText: Really awesome printer! Works great and after some tinkering with the settings on my phone it's super easy to use. I use it for several different selling platforms and it works great for all of them. Just save the PDF and then print it from the app on my phone. I will definitely use it for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This printer is made with good materials and I have had no issues so far! Was challenging to connect to a Mac at first. Can do lots of cool things. I use for printing shipping labels but you can use it for pictures, scans, and other things. The app is really handy and really easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely a great purchase!
reviews.reviewText: This product was by far the best value listed on Amazon. it features bluetooth, WiFI, and USB printing capabilities and at the lowest price.Beyond that the package was delivered 3 days earlier then estimated, and was incredibly well packaged. Surprisingly to me altho it was the most affordable lable printer I came across it was also very well built. Definitely a premium product. Setup was super simple. And the UX on the app is spot on!As by now I'm sure you can tell I am a happy customer 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This is my first thermal label printer and I'm happy I went with this one! Instructions were clear I connected to Bluetooth in a few seconds then printed my first label. Good price and quality definitely would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Great label printer!
reviews.reviewText: It took me a few minutes to learn how to find the settings for thermal printing using Shipstation, once I did it was perfect! I used to print out labels, cut to size then glue on the envelope, this faster, cheaper, with less mess.I'm really happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy and perfect to print label for my small business
reviews.reviewText: Just got my label printer and has been great so far - Easy to use and easy to print from my phone. I just wish that we could automatically print whatever we needed without going into the app and just have it connected and print from whatever screen that needs to be printed. But overall it was a smooth and easy process and now i can just print my shipping labels for poshmark and slap it on the package instead of printing then cutting then taping. Such a great thing to have and happy i purchased. It also printed clear and easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to set up and I was able to use right away. Would highly recommend.
